citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 3pm on
19-Apr-19.
The inspector made two separate phone calls attempting to contact the licensee and waited at the gated entrance to
the facility for 45 minutes before returning to their ODS.

narrative:
2.126(b)                    REPEAT
ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 3pm on
19-Apr-19.
The inspector made two separate phone calls attempting to contact the licensee and waited at the gated entrance to
the facility for 45 minutes before returning to their ODS.
